zmq_rpc
=======

0mq RPC calls implemented with pyzmq; part of the `zmq_rpc`_ project.

.. _zmq_rpc: https://bitbucket.org/xcg/zmq_rpc


Installing
----------

Install from pip::

    $ pip install zmq_rpc


Playing around
--------------

Run the demo server::

    python zmq_rpc/server.py

Run the demo client::

    python zmq_rpc/client.py

Watch them talk! =)
